It might be difficult to reproduce official Bentley Flying Spur 0-60 times driving your own car, as measuring accuracy of Bentley Flying Spur acceleration from 0 to 60 depends on the transmission type or such variables as wind, weather conditions, tire traction or even weight of the rim. For the safety of the public, 0-60 times are often recorded by professional drivers on the closed racing tracks or dragstrips.

The good news is you can always soup up your car to have the best drag times. The easiest way is chip-tuning.
